member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.AddCommand(System.String[],System.Action{System.String[],Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer},System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a chat command that can be triggered by multiple names.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.AddCommand(System.String,System.Action{System.String[],Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer},System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds a chat command with a single name.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.Teleport(Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer,UnityEngine.Vector3,System.Boolean)
member.summary: teleports a living player. if the player is dead, they are respawned.
member.param: The player to teleport
the position to teleport the player
whether to retain the player's loot or remove it.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.Teleport(Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer,UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Vector2,System.Boolean)
member.summary: teleports a living player. if the player is dead, they are respawned.
member.param: The player to teleport
the position to teleport the player
the rotation to have the player face
whether to retain the player's loot or remove it.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.Respawn(Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer,UnityEngine.Vector3,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
respawns the player using the vanilla method. Also works as a means to teleport players, reviving them if they are dead.
use waituntill ready if the player JUST DIED and you want them to respawn as soon as reasonably possible (after the player slow-motion-effect wears off)

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.KillPlayer(Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer,Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer)
member.summary: kills a player. probably doesnt send them to the respawn minigame, and hopefully doesnt kick the player either
member.param: The player to kill
Optional. allows a player to be awarded the kill

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.SetLoot(Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer,System.Int32[],System.Int32[])
member.summary: removes a player's loot and gives them items
member.param: The player to affect
an array of item ids. use the CitrusLib Item!
an array of quantities for each item

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.SetLoot(Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32})
member.summary: removes a player's loot and gives them items
member.param: The player to affect
a list of item ids. use the CitrusLib Item!
a list of quantities for each item

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.SetLoot(Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer,WobbleBridge.LootPack)
member.summary: Sets a players loot.
member.param: The Player to effect
The LootPack to give to the player.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.GiveLoot(Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: GIVES one stack of an item to a player
member.param: The player to affect
The item id. use the WobbleBridge Item enumerator!
Amount of the item to give

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.GiveLoot(Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: GIVES one stack of an item to a player
member.param: The player to affect
The item name. use the WobbleBridge Item enumerator!
Amount of the item to give

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.GiveLoot(Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer,WobbleBridge.LootPack)
member.summary: Gives a LootPack of items to a player
member.param: the player to affect
The WobbleBridge LootPack

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.Kick(Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer,Epic.OnlineServices.AntiCheatCommon.KickReason,System.String)
member.summary: Kicks a player, because the vanilla kick doesnt work under certain conditions.
member.param: The player to kick
a KickReason. the player sees this as a number when they are kicked.
A message as to why they are kicked. only printed to the console

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.SetTeam(Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer,System.Byte)
member.summary: tries to set a player to the sepecified team. beacause a clients team cannot ever change, this uses some wildly convoluted "relative" team id switches of non-client peers to create the illusion of a team change. On the server-side (here!), the players are eventually put on the same team. the function, as is, sometimes doesnt work because of lag and stuff. Generally its a good idea NOT to spam this function.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.SetTeam(WobbleBridge.PlayerRef,WobbleBridge.PlayerTeam)
member.summary: tries to set a player's team. this function uses WobbleBridge PlayerRefs and PlayerTeam objects, which might not be easier for you to use than vanilla ids and bytes in the function above.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.SelfParrot(Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer,System.String)
member.summary: makes the player throw a parrot at their feet with the desired message. Only the player throwing the parrot sees the message.
member.param: The player to through the parrot
the message

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.SetGear(Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Sets a player's gear. the client doesnt see the change, and should probably be alive during such a change.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.FixTeams
member.summary: yknow how team members are meant to have their names over their heads? changing teams and gear mid match causes issue with that. run this code AFTER calling set team or set gear. this is seperate from those function because you might be calling set team/gear many times and dont need redundant uses of this function. it also only needs to be called on players who have had people *join* their team...

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.AllExcept(System.Int32)
member.summary: returns a list of all player IDs except the specified one. for use with sendmessage
member.param: the index to ignore. doesnt nessesarily have to be a player who is actually connected to the server

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.DoOnceAlive(WobbleBridge.PlayerRef,System.Action)
member.summary: Performs an action once the player is alive and sending position updates again. The action is performed immediately if the player is currently alive. Good uses: team changes, gear changes.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.DoOnceAlive(Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer,System.Action)
member.summary: TABGPlayerServer overload of DoOnceAlive.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.WaitThen(System.Single,System.Action)
member.summary: Performs an action after a set amount of time.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.WaitUntil(System.Func{System.Boolean},System.Action,System.Single)
member.summary: Performs an action once a condition becomes true.
member.param: The condition to wait for.
The action to perform once the condition is met.
How often to check the condition in seconds. Don't set very low unless your condition is cheap!

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.WaitThenAsLongAs(System.Single,System.Func{System.Boolean},System.Action,System.Action,System.Single)
member.summary: Performs an action after a set delay, but only if the condition remains true throughout. Invokes the fail action if the condition becomes false at any point.
member.param: Time to wait before invoking the succeed action.
The condition that must remain true.
The action to perform on success.
The action to invoke on failure (can be null).
How often to check the condition in seconds.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.PlayerChatSearch(System.String,Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer@)
member.summary: Searches for a player first by name prefix, then by player index. Good for chat commands where users can type either a name or a numeric ID. Returns false if none or more than one match is found.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.PlayerWithIndex(System.Byte,Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer@)
member.summary: Finds a player by their numeric player index. Returns false if none or more than one match is found.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.PlayerWithName(System.String,Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer@)
member.summary: Finds a player whose name starts with the provided string (case-insensitive). Returns false if none or more than one match is found.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.RandomInRing(System.Int32,System.Predicate{UnityEngine.Vector3})
member.summary: Gets a random point within the current ring's white circle, snapped to the ground.
member.param: Number of attempts to find a valid point.
Optional predicate for additional position validation.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.RandomInCircle(UnityEngine.Vector3,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Predicate{UnityEngine.Vector3},System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a random point on land within a specified radius, snapped to the ground.
member.param: Center of the search circle.
Radius of the search circle.
Number of attempts to find a valid point.
Optional predicate for additional position validation.
Internal use — tracks original try count for error logging.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.ClearWeaponPatches(System.Int32)
member.summary: Clears all patches for a specific weapon ID.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.ClearAllWeaponPatches
member.summary: Clears every weapon patch — use before a config reload.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Wobble.GetCurrentWeaponID(Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer)
member.summary: Gets the current weapon ID directly from the player's equipment slots. Returns -1 if no weapon is active.

member.name: T:WobbleBridge.SettingObject
member.summary: A serializable setting, used when making custom settings files.

member.name: F:WobbleBridge.SettingObject.name
member.summary: the name of the setting

member.name: F:WobbleBridge.SettingObject.description
member.summary: a description of the setting

member.name: T:WobbleBridge.SettingsFile`1
member.summary: A Settings file, containing a list of SettingObjects.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.SettingsFile`1.SetSetting(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets a setting and then writes all settings. use this for mid-match setting changes, via commands for example.
member.param: the name of a setting to change
the value to set it to

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.SettingsFile`1.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: creates a settings file at the specified path.
member.param: The filepath. if absolute is set to false, the filepath starts in the application's directory
if true, the filepath is relative to the application's install location

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.SettingsFile`1.ReadSettings
member.summary: reads the settings from it's file. if it doesn't exist, a file with default values is created instead. If the file exists, but some settings are missing, those missing settings are set to their defaults and added to the file

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.SettingsFile`1.WriteSettings
member.summary: writes all the settings current values to it's file.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.SettingsFile`1.AddSetting(`0)
member.summary: adds a SettingObject to the DEFAULT settings list. use when initializing the default settings, BEFORE ever reading!
member.param: The SettingObject to add

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.SettingsFile`1.TryGetSetting(System.String,`0@)
member.summary:
looks for a setting with name and returns true if found.
if a setting isnt found in the main settings, returns the default value and re-'reads' the settings file, adding ALL missing entries.
if a setting isnt found, returns false!
member.param: the name of the setting
a SettingObject out parameter

member.name: T:WobbleBridge.GameSetting
member.summary: a common purpose SettingObject. Has a string value. it's reccomended to use this when making settings

member.name: F:WobbleBridge.GameSetting.value
member.summary: the value of the setting

member.name: T:WobbleBridge.Logger
member.summary: A class for prettier debug logging.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Logger.#ctor(System.String,System.ConsoleColor)
member.summary: Creates a new Logger for your mod.
member.param: The name of your mod, or a sub-name if your mod has multiple separate parts.
The color of the name prefix.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Logger.Log(System.String)
member.summary: Logs a standard message to the console.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Logger.LogWarning(System.String)
member.summary: Logs a warning to the console (yellow).

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.Logger.LogError(System.String)
member.summary: Logs an error to the console (red).

member.name: T:WobbleBridge.LootPack
member.summary: A class for creating groups of items, to simplify item-giving

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.LootPack.#ctor
member.summary: makes a new, empty lootpack.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.LootPack.#ctor(Loot[])
member.summary: creates a lootpack using TABG's Loot array as an input

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.LootPack.AddLoot(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: adds a stack of an item to the loot pack.
member.param: the id of the item. use the WobbleBridge Item enum!
the amount to add.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.LootPack.CopyPlayerLoot(System.Collections.Generic.List{Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerLootItem})
member.summary: creates a lootpack that is a copy of the provided list of playerlootitems, which can be read from a TABGPlayerServer.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.LootPack.GiveTo(Landfall.Network.TABGPlayerServer)
member.summary: gives the items to the player. the player should be alive
member.param: the player to recieve the items

member.name: T:WobbleBridge.Item
member.summary: an enum list of every vanilla item. helps hard-coding item-give commands and lootpacks easier

member.name: T:WobbleBridge.WeaponPatchManager.WeaponPatch
member.summary: All fields are nullable — only set fields will override the game's defaults.

member.name: P:WobbleBridge.WeaponPatchManager.WeaponPatch.DamageMultiplier
member.summary: Multiplier applied to all damage dealt by this weapon. (1.0 = no change)

member.name: P:WobbleBridge.WeaponPatchManager.WeaponPatch.SpreadMultiplier
member.summary: Multiplier applied to the weapon's base spread. (1.0 = no change)

member.name: P:WobbleBridge.WeaponPatchManager.WeaponPatch.HipSpreadValue
member.summary: Overrides the hip-fire spread value directly. The game default varies per weapon — set to 0 for perfect hip-fire accuracy.

member.name: P:WobbleBridge.WeaponPatchManager.WeaponPatch.ExtraSpread
member.summary: Overrides the extra flat spread added on top of the base spread. Set to 0 to remove all extra spread.

member.name: P:WobbleBridge.WeaponPatchManager.WeaponPatch.FireRateMultiplier
member.summary: Multiplier applied to fire rate. (>1.0 = faster, <1.0 = slower)

member.name: P:WobbleBridge.WeaponPatchManager.WeaponPatch.BulletSpeedMultiplier
member.summary: Multiplier applied to bullet travel speed. (1.0 = no change)

member.name: P:WobbleBridge.WeaponPatchManager.WeaponPatch.MagSizeOverride
member.summary: Directly overrides the magazine size. Replaces the game value entirely — not a multiplier.

member.name: P:WobbleBridge.WeaponPatchManager.WeaponPatch.ReloadTimeMultiplier
member.summary: Multiplier applied to reload time. (<1.0 = faster reload, >1.0 = slower)

member.name: T:WobbleBridge.PlayerRef
member.summary: Wraps a TABGPlayerServer with a flexible key-value data store. Can be used by other mods to attach custom data to a player.

member.name: M:WobbleBridge.PlayerRef.Get``1(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a typed value from the data store. Returns default(T) if the key doesn't exist.

member.name: T:WobbleBridge.PlayerTeam
member.summary: Represents a team group with a list of PlayerRefs and a group index.
